anya-e0102n0:5_0: 365. Idāni yāsaṁ lokikābhiññānaṁ vasena ayaṁ samādhibhāvanā abhiññānisaṁsāti vuttā,
anya-e0102n0:5_1: tā abhiññā sampādetuṁ yasmā pathavīkasiṇādīsu adhigatacatutthajjhānena yoginā yogo
anya-e0102n0:5_2: kātabbo. Evañhissa sā samādhibhāvanā adhigatānisaṁsā ceva bhavissati thiratarā ca,
anya-e0102n0:5_3: so adhigatānisaṁsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṁ
anya-e0102n0:6_1: uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītadhammadesanatthañca “so evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte
anya-e0102n0:6_2: anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte iddhividhāya cittaṁ
anya-e0102n0:6_3: abhinīharati abhininnāmeti. So anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā
anya-e0102n0:6_4: bahudhā hotī”tiādinā nayena iddhividhaṁ, dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṁ, cetopariyañāṇaṁ, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:6_5: sattānaṁ cutūpapāte ñāṇanti pañca lokikābhiññā vuttā.
anya-e0102n0:7: Tattha ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādikaṁ iddhivikubbanaṁ kātukāmena ādikammikena yoginā odātakasiṇapariyantesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā –
anya-e0102n0:10_0: 366. Katamaṁ panettha kasiṇānulomaṁ…pe… katamaṁ ārammaṇavavatthāpananti. Idha bhikkhu
anya-e0102n0:10_1: pathavīkasiṇe jhānaṁ samāpajjati, tato āpokasiṇeti evaṁ paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu
anya-e0102n0:10_2: satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjati, idaṁ kasiṇānulomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:11: Odātakasiṇato pana paṭṭhāya tatheva paṭilomakkamena samāpajjanaṁ kasiṇapaṭilomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:12: Pathavīkasiṇato paṭṭhāya yāva odātakasiṇaṁ, odātakasiṇatopi paṭṭhāya yāva pathavīkasiṇanti evaṁ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṁ samāpajjanaṁ kasiṇānulomapaṭilomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:13: Paṭhamajjhānato pana paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ, tāva punappunaṁ samāpajjanaṁ jhānānulomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:14: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānaṁ, tāva punappunaṁ samāpajjanaṁ jhānapaṭilomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:15_0: Paṭhamajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n0:15_1: yāva paṭhamajjhānanti evaṁ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṁ samāpajjanaṁ jhānānulomapaṭilomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:16_0: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṁ samāpajjati, tato
anya-e0102n0:16_1: tadeva ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ, tato ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṁ kasiṇaṁ anukkamitvā
anya-e0102n0:16_2: jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṁ jhānukkantikaṁ nāma. Evaṁ āpokasiṇādimūlikāpi yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0102n0:17_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇe, tato nīlakasiṇe,
anya-e0102n0:17_1: tato lohitakasiṇeti iminā nayena jhānaṁ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena
anya-e0102n0:18_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tato tejokasiṇe tatiyaṁ, nīlakasiṇaṁ ugghāṭetvā
anya-e0102n0:18_1: ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ, lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti iminā nayena jhānassa ceva kasiṇassa
anya-e0102n0:19: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṁ aṅgasaṅkantikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:20: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tadeva āpokasiṇe…pe… tadeva odātakasiṇeti evaṁ sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṁ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:21_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā āpokasiṇe dutiyaṁ, tejokasiṇe tatiyaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:21_1: vāyokasiṇe catutthaṁ, nīlakasiṇaṁ ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ, pītakasiṇato viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:21_2: lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ, odātakasiṇato nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṁ ekantarikavasena
anya-e0102n0:22_0: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ pana pañcaṅgikanti vavatthapetvā dutiyaṁ tivaṅgikaṁ, tatiyaṁ duvaṅgikaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:22_1: tathā catutthaṁ ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṁ jhānaṅgamattasseva
anya-e0102n0:23_0: Tathā idaṁ pathavīkasiṇanti vavatthapetvā idaṁ āpokasiṇaṁ…pe… idaṁ odātakasiṇanti
anya-e0102n0:23_1: evaṁ ārammaṇamattasseva vavatthāpanaṁ ārammaṇavavatthāpanaṁ nāma. Aṅgārammaṇavavatthāpanampi
anya-e0102n0:23_2: eke icchanti. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā addhā taṁ bhāvanāmukhaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0102n0:24_0: 367. Imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṁ aparidametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko
anya-e0102n0:24_1: yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṁ sampādessatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati. Ādikammikassa hi
anya-e0102n0:24_2: kasiṇaparikammampi bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Katakasiṇaparikammassa
anya-e0102n0:24_3: nimittuppādanaṁ bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Uppanne nimitte taṁ vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0102n0:24_4: appanādhigamo bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Adhigatappanassa cuddasahākārehi
anya-e0102n0:24_5: cittaparidamanaṁ bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Cuddasahākārehi paridamitacittassāpi
anya-e0102n0:24_6: iddhivikubbanaṁ nāma bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. Vikubbanappattassāpi
anya-e0102n0:24_7: khippanisantibhāvo nāma bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisantī hoti. Therambatthale
anya-e0102n0:24_9: upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko rakkhitatthero viya. Tassānubhāvo pathavīkasiṇaniddese
anya-e0102n0:24_10: vuttoyeva. Taṁ panassānubhāvaṁ disvā thero āha “āvuso, sace rakkhito nābhavissa sabbe
anya-e0102n0:24_11: garahappattā assāma ‘nāgarājānaṁ rakkhituṁ nāsakkhiṁsū’ti. Tasmā attanā gahetvā vicaritabbaṁ
anya-e0102n0:24_12: āvudhaṁ nāma malaṁ sodhetvāva gahetvā vicarituṁ vaṭṭatī”ti. Te therassa ovāde ṭhatvā
anya-e0102n0:25_0: Khippanisantiyāpi ca sati parassa patiṭṭhābhāvo bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova
anya-e0102n0:25_1: hoti, giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya mārena aṅgāravasse pavattite ākāse pathaviṁ māpetvā
anya-e0102n0:26_0: Balavapubbayogānaṁ pana buddhapaccekabuddhaaggasāvakādīnaṁ vināpi iminā vuttappakārena
anya-e0102n0:26_1: bhāvanānukkamena arahattapaṭilābheneva idañca iddhivikubbanaṁ aññe ca paṭisambhidādibhedā
anya-e0102n0:26_2: guṇā ijjhanti. Tasmā yathā piḷandhanavikatiṁ kattukāmo suvaṇṇakāro aggidhamanādīhi
anya-e0102n0:26_3: suvaṇṇaṁ muduṁ kammaññaṁ katvāva karoti, yathā ca bhājanavikatiṁ kattukāmo kumbhakāro
anya-e0102n0:26_4: mattikaṁ suparimadditaṁ muduṁ katvā karoti, evameva ādikammikena imehi cuddasahākārehi
anya-e0102n0:26_6: āvajjanādivasībhāvavasena ca muduṁ kammaññaṁ katvā iddhividhāya yogo karaṇīyo. Pubbahetusampannena
anya-e0102n0:26_7: pana kasiṇesu catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasināpi kātuṁ vaṭṭati. Yathā panettha yogo
anya-e0102n0:26_8: kātabbo, taṁ vidhiṁ dassento bhagavā “so evaṁ samāhite citte”tiādimāha.
anya-e0102n0:27_0: 368. Tatrāyaṁ pāḷinayānusāreneva vinicchayakathā. Tattha soti so adhigatacatutthajjhāno
anya-e0102n0:27_1: yogī. Evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanametaṁ. Iminā paṭhamajjhānādhigamādinā kamena
anya-e0102n0:27_2: catutthajjhānaṁ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṁ hoti. Samāhiteti iminā catutthajjhānasamādhinā
anya-e0102n0:27_3: samāhite. Citteti rūpāvacaracitte. Parisuddhetiādīsu pana upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena
anya-e0102n0:27_4: parisuddhe. Parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte, pabhassareti vuttaṁ hoti. Sukhādīnaṁ paccayānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:27_5: ghātena vihatarāgādiaṅgaṇattā anaṅgaṇe. Anaṅgaṇattāyeva vigatūpakkilese. Aṅgaṇena
anya-e0102n0:27_6: hi taṁ cittaṁ upakkilissati. Subhāvitattā mudubhūte, vasībhāvappatteti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n0:27_7: Vase vattamānaṁ hi cittaṁ mudunti vuccati. Muduttāyeva ca kammaniye, kammakkhame
anya-e0102n0:27_8: kammayoggeti vuttaṁ hoti. Muduṁ hi cittaṁ kammaniyaṁ hoti sudantamiva suvaṇṇaṁ, tañca
anya-e0102n0:27_9: ubhayampi subhāvitattāyevāti. Yathāha “nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0102n0:27_10: yaṁ evaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca, yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, citta”nti.
anya-e0102n0:28_0: Etesu parisuddhabhāvādīsu ṭhitattā ṭhite. Ṭhitattāyeva āneñjappatte, acale niriñjaneti
anya-e0102n0:28_1: vuttaṁ hoti. Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite. Saddhādīhi pariggahitattā
anya-e0102n0:28_2: āneñjappatte. Saddhāpariggahitaṁ hi cittaṁ assaddhiyena na iñjati. Vīriyapariggahitaṁ
anya-e0102n0:28_3: kosajjena na iñjati. Satipariggahitaṁ pamādena na iñjati. Samādhipariggahitaṁ uddhaccena
anya-e0102n0:28_4: na iñjati. Paññāpariggahitaṁ avijjāya na iñjati. Obhāsagataṁ kilesandhakārena na
anya-e0102n0:28_5: iñjati. Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ hoti. Evaṁ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ
anya-e0102n0:28_6: cittaṁ abhinīhārakkhamaṁ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya.
anya-e0102n0:29_0: Aparo nayo, catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhite. Nīvaraṇadūrabhāvena parisuddhe. Vitakkādisamatikkamena
anya-e0102n0:29_1: pariyodāte. Jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānaṁ icchāvacarānaṁ abhāvena anaṅgaṇe. Abhijjhādīnaṁ
anya-e0102n0:29_2: cittassa upakkilesānaṁ vigamena vigatūpakkilese. Ubhayampi cetaṁ anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttānusārena
anya-e0102n0:29_3: veditabbaṁ. Vasippattiyā mudubhūte. Iddhipādabhāvūpagamena kammaniye. Bhāvanāpāripūriyā
anya-e0102n0:29_4: paṇītabhāvūpagamena ṭhite āneñjappatte. Yathā āneñjappattaṁ hoti, evaṁ ṭhiteti attho.
anya-e0102n0:29_5: Evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ cittaṁ abhinīhārakkhamaṁ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:31_0: 369.Iddhividhāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti ettha ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi, nipphattiatthena
anya-e0102n0:31_1: paṭilābhaṭṭhena cāti vuttaṁ hoti. Yañhi nipphajjati paṭilabbhati ca, taṁ ijjhatīti
anya-e0102n0:31_2: vuccati. Yathāha “kāmaṁ kāmayamānassa, tassa cetaṁ samijjhatī”ti. Tathā “nekkhammaṁ
anya-e0102n0:31_3: ijjhatīti iddhi, paṭiharatīti pāṭihāriyaṁ. Arahattamaggo ijjhatīti iddhi, paṭiharatīti pāṭihāriya”nti.
anya-e0102n0:32_0: Aparo nayo, ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi. Upāyasampadāyetamadhivacanaṁ. Upāyasampadā hi ijjhati
anya-e0102n0:32_1: adhippetaphalappasavanato. Yathāha – “ayaṁ kho citto gahapati sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo,
anya-e0102n0:32_2: sace paṇidahissati ‘anāgatamaddhānaṁ rājā assaṁ cakkavattī’ti, tassa kho ayaṁ ijjhissati
anya-e0102n0:33_0: Aparo nayo, etāya sattā ijjhantīti iddhi. Ijjhantīti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti
anya-e0102n0:33_1: vuttaṁ hoti. Sā dasavidhā. Yathāha “kati iddhiyoti dasa iddhiyo”. Puna caparaṁ āha
anya-e0102n0:33_2: “katamā dasa iddhiyo ? Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā
anya-e0102n0:33_3: iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi,
anya-e0102n0:33_4: vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:34_0: 370. Tattha “pakatiyā eko bahukaṁ āvajjati. Sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā satasahassaṁ vā
anya-e0102n0:34_1: āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti ‘bahuko homī”’ti evaṁ vibhajitvā dassitā iddhi adhiṭṭhānavasena
anya-e0102n0:35_0: 371. “So pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṁ vā…pe… vividhampi
anya-e0102n0:35_1: senābyūhaṁ dassetī”ti evaṁ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā
anya-e0102n0:36_0: 372. “Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomaya”nti iminā
anya-e0102n0:36_1: nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrabbhantare aññasseva manomayassa sarīrassa nipphattivasena
anya-e0102n0:37_0: 373. Ñāṇuppattito pana pubbe vā pacchā vā taṁkhaṇe vā ñāṇānubhāvanibbatto viseso
anya-e0102n0:37_1: ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma. Vuttañhetaṁ – “aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāya pahānaṭṭho
anya-e0102n0:37_2: ijjhatīti ñāṇavipphārā iddhi…pe… arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṁ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti
anya-e0102n0:37_3: ñāṇavipphārā iddhi. Āyasmato bākkulassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi. Āyasmato saṁkiccassa
anya-e0102n0:37_4: ñāṇavipphārā iddhi. Āyasmato bhūtapālassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:38_0: Tattha āyasmā bākkulo daharova maṅgaladivase nadiyā nhāpiyamāno dhātiyā pamādena
anya-e0102n0:38_1: sote patito. Tamenaṁ maccho gilitvā bārāṇasītitthaṁ agamāsi. Tatra taṁ macchabandho
anya-e0102n0:38_2: gahetvā seṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇi. Sā macche sinehaṁ uppādetvā ahameva naṁ pacissāmīti
anya-e0102n0:38_3: phālentī macchakucchiyaṁ suvaṇṇabimbaṁ viya dārakaṁ disvā putto me laddhoti somanassajātā
anya-e0102n0:38_4: ahosi. Iti macchakucchiyaṁ arogabhāvo āyasmato bākkulassa pacchimabhavikassa tena
anya-e0102n0:39_0: Saṁkiccattherassa pana gabbhagatasseva mātā kālamakāsi. Tassā citakaṁ āropetvā sūlehi
anya-e0102n0:39_1: vijjhitvā jhāpiyamānāya dārako sūlakoṭiyā akkhikūṭe pahāraṁ labhitvā saddaṁ akāsi.
anya-e0102n0:39_2: Tato dārako jīvatīti otāretvā kucchiṁ phāletvā dārakaṁ ayyikāya adaṁsu. So tāya paṭijaggito
anya-e0102n0:39_3: vuddhimanvāya pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Iti vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n0:39_4: dārucitakāya arogabhāvo āyasmato saṁkiccassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n0:40_0: Bhūtapāladārakassa pana pitā rājagahe daliddamanusso. So dārūnaṁ atthāya sakaṭena
anya-e0102n0:40_1: aṭaviṁ gantvā dārubhāraṁ katvā sāyaṁ nagaradvārasamīpaṁ patto. Athassa goṇā yugaṁ
anya-e0102n0:40_2: ossajjitvā nagaraṁ pavisiṁsu. So sakaṭamūle puttakaṁ nisīdāpetvā goṇānaṁ anupadaṁ
anya-e0102n0:40_3: gacchanto nagarameva pāvisi. Tassa anikkhantasseva dvāraṁ pihitaṁ. Dārakassa vāḷayakkhānucaritepi
anya-e0102n0:40_4: bahinagare tiyāmarattiṁ arogabhāvo vuttanayeneva ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma. Vatthu
anya-e0102n0:41_0: 374. Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṁkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvanibbatto viseso samādhivipphārā
anya-e0102n0:41_1: iddhi. Vuttañhetaṁ “paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇānaṁ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti samādhivipphārā
anya-e0102n0:41_3: samādhivipphārā iddhi. Āyasmato sāriputtassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato sañjīvassa,
anya-e0102n0:41_4: āyasmato khāṇukoṇḍaññassa, uttarāya upāsikāya, sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:42_0: Tattha yadā āyasmato sāriputtassa mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṁ kapotakandarāyaṁ
anya-e0102n0:42_1: viharato juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi ajjhokāse nisinnassa eko duṭṭhayakkho
anya-e0102n0:42_2: sahāyakena yakkhena vāriyamānopi sīse pahāramadāsi. Yassa meghassa viya gajjato saddo
anya-e0102n0:42_3: ahosi. Tadā thero tassa paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṁ appesi. Athassa tena pahārena na
anya-e0102n0:42_4: koci ābādho ahosi. Ayaṁ tassāyasmato samādhivipphārā iddhi. Vatthu pana udāne āgatameva.
anya-e0102n0:43_0: Sañjīvattheraṁ pana nirodhasamāpannaṁ kālakatoti sallakkhetvā gopālakādayo tiṇakaṭṭhagomayāni
anya-e0102n0:43_1: saṅkaḍḍhetvā aggiṁ adaṁsu. Therassa cīvare aṁsumattampi najjhāyittha. Ayamassa anupubbasamāpattivasena
anya-e0102n0:43_2: pavattasamathānubhāvanibbattattā samādhivipphārā iddhi. Vatthu pana sutte āgatameva.
anya-e0102n0:44_0: Khāṇukoṇḍaññatthero pana pakatiyāva samāpattibahulo. So aññatarasmiṁ araññe rattiṁ
anya-e0102n0:44_1: samāpattiṁ appetvā nisīdi. Pañcasatā corā bhaṇḍakaṁ thenetvā gacchantā “idāni amhākaṁ
anya-e0102n0:44_2: anupathaṁ āgacchantā natthī”ti vissamitukāmā bhaṇḍakaṁ oropayamānā “khāṇuko aya”nti
anya-e0102n0:44_3: maññamānā therasseva upari sabbabhaṇḍakāni ṭhapesuṁ. Tesaṁ vissamitvā gacchantānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:44_4: paṭhamaṁ ṭhapitabhaṇḍakassa gahaṇakāle kālaparicchedavasena thero vuṭṭhāsi. Te therassa
anya-e0102n0:44_5: calanākāraṁ disvā bhītā viraviṁsu. Thero “mā bhāyittha upāsakā, bhikkhu aha”nti āha.
anya-e0102n0:44_6: Te āgantvā vanditvā theragatena pasādena pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ
anya-e0102n0:44_7: pāpuṇiṁsu. Ayamettha pañcahi bhaṇḍakasatehi ajjhotthaṭassa therassa ābādhābhāvo samādhivipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:45_0: Uttarā pana upāsikā puṇṇaseṭṭhissa dhītā. Tassā sirimā nāma gaṇikā issāpakatā tattatelakaṭāhaṁ
anya-e0102n0:45_1: sīse āsiñci. Uttarā taṁkhaṇaññeva mettaṁ samāpajji. Telaṁ pokkharapattato udakabindu
anya-e0102n0:45_2: viya vivaṭṭamānaṁ agamāsi. Ayamassā samādhivipphārā iddhi. Vatthu pana vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:46_0: Sāmāvatī nāma udenassa rañño aggamahesī. Māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇo attano dhītāya aggamahesiṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:46_1: patthayamāno tassā vīṇāya āsīvisaṁ pakkhipāpetvā rājānaṁ āha “mahārāja, sāmāvatī
anya-e0102n0:46_2: taṁ māretukāmā vīṇāya āsīvisaṁ gahetvā pariharatī”ti. Rājā taṁ disvā kupito sāmāvatiṁ
anya-e0102n0:46_3: vadhissāmīti dhanuṁ āropetvā visapītaṁ khurappaṁ sannayhi. Sāmāvatī saparivārā rājānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:46_4: mettāya phari. Rājā neva saraṁ khipituṁ na oropetuṁ sakkonto vedhamāno aṭṭhāsi. Tato
anya-e0102n0:46_5: naṁ devī āha “kiṁ, mahārāja, kilamasī”ti? “Āma kilamāmī”ti. “Tena hi dhanuṁ oropehī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:46_6: Saro rañño pādamūleyeva pati. Tato naṁ devī “mahārāja, appaduṭṭhassa nappadussitabba”nti
anya-e0102n0:46_7: ovadi. Iti rañño saraṁ muñcituṁ avisahanabhāvo sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhīti.
anya-e0102n0:47_0: 375. Paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññivihārādikā pana ariyā iddhi nāma. Yathāha – “katamā
anya-e0102n0:47_1: ariyā iddhi? Idha – bhikkhu sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññī vihareyya’nti,
anya-e0102n0:47_2: appaṭikkūlasaññī tattha viharati…pe… upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajāno”ti.
anya-e0102n0:47_3: Ayañhi cetovasippattānaṁ ariyānaṁyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n0:48_0: Etāya hi samannāgato khīṇāsavo bhikkhu paṭikkūle aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṁ mettāpharaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n0:48_1: vā dhātumanasikāraṁ vā karonto appaṭikkūlasaññī viharati. Appaṭikkūle iṭṭhe vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0102n0:48_2: asubhapharaṇaṁ vā aniccanti manasikāraṁ vā karonto paṭikkūlasaññī viharati. Tathā
anya-e0102n0:48_3: paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlesu tadeva mettāpharaṇaṁ vā dhātumanasikāraṁ vā karonto appaṭikkūlasaññī
anya-e0102n0:48_4: viharati. Appaṭikkūlapaṭikkūlesu ca tadeva asubhapharaṇaṁ vā aniccanti manasikāraṁ
anya-e0102n0:48_5: vā karonto paṭikkūlasaññī viharati. Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā neva sumano hotītiādinā
anya-e0102n0:48_6: nayena vuttaṁ pana chaḷaṅgupekkhaṁ pavattayamāno paṭikkūle ca appaṭikkūle ca tadubhayaṁ
anya-e0102n0:48_7: abhinivajjitvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. Paṭisambhidāyañhi “kathaṁ paṭikkūle
anya-e0102n0:48_8: appaṭikkūlasaññī viharati? Aniṭṭhasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ mettāya vā pharati dhātuso vā upasaṁharatī”tiādinā
anya-e0102n0:48_9: nayena ayameva attho vibhatto. Ayaṁ cetovasippattānaṁ ariyānaṁyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n0:49_0: 376. Pakkhīādīnaṁ pana vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi nāma. Yathāha – “katamā
anya-e0102n0:49_1: kammavipākajā iddhi? Sabbesaṁ pakkhīnaṁ sabbesaṁ devānaṁ ekaccānaṁ manussānaṁ ekaccānañca
anya-e0102n0:49_2: vinipātikānaṁ ayaṁ kammavipākajā iddhī”ti. Ettha hi sabbesaṁ pakkhīnaṁ jhānaṁ vā
anya-e0102n0:49_3: vipassanaṁ vā vināyeva ākāsena gamanaṁ. Tathā sabbesaṁ devānaṁ paṭhamakappikānañca
anya-e0102n0:49_4: ekaccānaṁ manussānaṁ. Tathā piyaṅkaramātā yakkhinī uttaramātā phussamittā dhammaguttāti
anya-e0102n0:49_5: evamādīnaṁ ekaccānaṁ vinipātikānaṁ ākāsena gamanaṁ kammavipākajā iddhīti.
anya-e0102n0:50_0: 377. Cakkavattiādīnaṁ vehāsagamanādikā pana puññavato iddhi nāma. Yathāha “katamā
anya-e0102n0:50_1: puññavato iddhi? Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṁ gacchati saddhiṁ caturaṅginiyā senāya antamaso
anya-e0102n0:50_2: assabandhagobandhapurise upādāya. Jotikassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Jaṭilakassa
anya-e0102n0:50_3: gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Ghositassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Meṇḍakassa gahapatissa
anya-e0102n0:50_4: puññavato iddhi. Pañcannaṁ mahāpuññānaṁ puññavato iddhī”ti. Saṅkhepato pana paripākaṁ
anya-e0102n0:51_0: Ettha ca jotikassa gahapatissa pathaviṁ bhinditvā maṇipāsādo uṭṭhahi. Catusaṭṭhi
anya-e0102n0:51_1: ca kapparukkhāti ayamassa puññavato iddhi. Jaṭilakassa asītihattho suvaṇṇapabbato
anya-e0102n0:51_2: nibbatti. Ghositassa sattasu ṭhānesu māraṇatthāya upakkame katepi arogabhāvo puññavato
anya-e0102n0:51_3: iddhi. Meṇḍakassa ekakarīsamatte padese sattaratanamayānaṁ meṇḍakānaṁ pātubhāvo puññavato
anya-e0102n0:51_4: iddhi. Pañca mahāpuññā nāma meṇḍakaseṭṭhi, tassa bhariyā candapadumasirī, putto dhanañcayaseṭṭhi,
anya-e0102n0:51_5: suṇisā sumanadevī, dāso puṇṇo nāmāti. Tesu seṭṭhissa sīsaṁ nhātassa ākāsaṁ ullokanakāle
anya-e0102n0:51_6: aḍḍhateḷasakoṭṭhasahassāni ākāsato rattasālīnaṁ pūrenti. Bhariyāya nāḷikodanamattampi
anya-e0102n0:51_7: gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsike parivisamānāya bhattaṁ na khīyati. Puttassa sahassatthavikaṁ
anya-e0102n0:51_8: gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsikānampi dentassa kahāpaṇā na khīyanti. Suṇisāya ekaṁ vīhitumbaṁ
anya-e0102n0:51_9: gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsikānampi bhājayamānāya dhaññaṁ na khīyati. Dāsassa ekena
anya-e0102n0:51_10: naṅgalena kasato ito satta ito sattāti cuddasa maggā honti. Ayaṁ nesaṁ puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:52_0: 378. Vijjādharādīnaṁ vehāsagamanādikā pana vijjāmayā iddhi. Yathāha “katamā vijjāmayā
anya-e0102n0:52_1: iddhi? Vijjādharā vijjaṁ parijapitvā vehāsaṁ gacchanti. Ākāse antalikkhe hatthimpi
anya-e0102n0:53_0: 379. Tena tena pana sammāpayogena tassa tassa kammassa ijjhanaṁ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā
anya-e0102n0:53_1: ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi. Yathāha – “nekkhammena kāmacchandassa pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti tattha
anya-e0102n0:53_2: tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi…pe… arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:53_3: pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī”ti. Ettha
anya-e0102n0:53_4: ca paṭipattisaṅkhātasseva sammāpayogassa dīpanavasena purimapāḷisadisāva pāḷi āgatā.
anya-e0102n0:53_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana sakaṭabyūhādikaraṇavasena yaṁkiñci sippakammaṁ yaṁkiñci vejjakammaṁ
anya-e0102n0:53_6: tiṇṇaṁ bedānaṁ uggahaṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ piṭakānaṁ uggahaṇaṁ antamaso kasanavapanādīni upādāya
anya-e0102n0:53_7: taṁ taṁ kammaṁ katvā nibbattaviseso tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhīti āgatā. (10)
anya-e0102n0:54: Iti imāsu dasasu iddhīsu iddhividhāyāti imasmiṁ pade adhiṭṭhānā iddhiyeva āgatā. Imasmiṁ panatthe vikubbanāmanomayāiddhiyopi icchitabbā eva.
anya-e0102n0:55_0: 380.Iddhividhāyāti iddhikoṭṭhāsāya, iddhivikappāya vā. Cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti
anya-e0102n0:55_1: so bhikkhu vuttappakāravasena tasmiṁ citte abhiññāpādake jāte iddhividhādhigamatthāya
anya-e0102n0:55_2: parikammacittaṁ abhinīharati kasiṇārammaṇato apanetvā iddhividhābhimukhaṁ peseti.
anya-e0102n0:55_3: Abhininnāmetīti adhigantabbaiddhipoṇaṁ iddhipabbhāraṁ karoti. Soti so evaṁ katacittābhinīhāro
anya-e0102n0:55_4: bhikkhu. Anekavihitanti anekavidhaṁ nānappakārakaṁ. Iddhividhanti iddhikoṭṭhāsaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:55_5: Paccanubhotīti paccanubhavati, phusati sacchikaroti pāpuṇātīti attho. Idānissa anekavihitabhāvaṁ
anya-e0102n0:55_6: dassento “ekopi hutvā”tiādimāha. Tattha ekopi hutvāti iddhikaraṇato pubbe pakatiyā
anya-e0102n0:55_7: ekopi hutvā. Bahudhā hotīti bahūnaṁ santike caṅkamitukāmo vā sajjhāyaṁ vā kattukāmo
anya-e0102n0:55_8: pañhaṁ vā pucchitukāmo hutvā satampi sahassampi hoti. Kathaṁ panāyamevaṁ hoti? Iddhiyā
anya-e0102n0:55_9: catasso bhūmiyo cattāro pādā aṭṭha padāni soḷasa ca mūlāni sampādetvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto.
anya-e0102n0:56_0: 381. Tattha catasso bhūmiyoti cattāri jhānāni veditabbāni. Vuttañhetaṁ dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0102n0:56_1: “iddhiyā katamā catasso bhūmiyo? Vivekajabhūmi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ, pītisukhabhūmi dutiyaṁ
anya-e0102n0:56_2: jhānaṁ, upekkhāsukhabhūmi tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, adukkhamasukhabhūmi catutthaṁ jhānaṁ. Iddhiyā
anya-e0102n0:56_3: imā catasso bhūmiyo iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya
anya-e0102n0:56_4: iddhivasitāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantī”ti. Ettha ca purimāni tīṇi jhānāni yasmā
anya-e0102n0:56_5: pītipharaṇena ca sukhapharaṇena ca sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā lahumudukammaññakāyo
anya-e0102n0:56_6: iddhiṁ pāpuṇāti, tasmā iminā pariyāyena iddhilābhāya saṁvattanato sambhārabhūmiyoti
anya-e0102n0:57_0: 382.Cattāro pādāti cattāro iddhipādā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṁ “iddhiyā katame cattāro
anya-e0102n0:57_1: pādā? Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti. Vīriya…
anya-e0102n0:57_2: citta… vīmaṁsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti. Iddhiyā ime
anya-e0102n0:57_3: cattāro pādā iddhilābhāya…pe… iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantī”ti. Ettha ca chandahetuko
anya-e0102n0:57_4: chandādhiko vā samādhi chandasamādhi. Kattukamyatāchandaṁ adhipatiṁ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhissetaṁ
anya-e0102n0:57_5: adhivacanaṁ. Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā. Catukiccasādhakassa sammappadhānavīriyassetaṁ
anya-e0102n0:57_6: adhivacanaṁ. Samannāgatanti chandasamādhinā ca padhānasaṅkhārehi ca upetaṁ. Iddhipādanti
anya-e0102n0:57_7: nipphattipariyāyena vā ijjhanaṭṭhena, ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā
anya-e0102n0:57_8: hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhīti saṅkhaṁ gatānaṁ abhiññācittasampayuttānaṁ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:58_0: Atha vā pajjate anenāti pādo. Pāpuṇīyatīti attho. Iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo. Chandādīnametaṁ
anya-e0102n0:58_1: adhivacanaṁ. Yathāha – “chandañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati
anya-e0102n0:58_2: cittassekaggataṁ, ayaṁ vuccati chandasamādhi. So anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ…pe… padahati,
anya-e0102n0:58_3: ime vuccanti padhānasaṅkhārā. Iti ayañca chando ayañca chandasamādhi ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā,
anya-e0102n0:58_4: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgato iddhipādo”ti. Evaṁ
anya-e0102n0:59_0: 383.Aṭṭha padānīti chandādīni aṭṭha veditabbāni. Vuttañhetaṁ “iddhiyā katamāni aṭṭha
anya-e0102n0:59_1: padāni? Chandañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassekaggataṁ. Chando
anya-e0102n0:59_2: na samādhi, samādhi na chando. Añño chando, añño samādhi. Vīriyañce bhikkhu… cittañce
anya-e0102n0:59_3: bhikkhu… vīmaṁsañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassekaggataṁ. Vīmaṁsā
anya-e0102n0:59_4: na samādhi, samādhi na vīmaṁsā. Aññā vīmaṁsā, añño samādhi. Iddhiyā imāni aṭṭha padāni
anya-e0102n0:59_5: iddhilābhāya…pe… iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantī”ti. Ettha hi iddhimuppādetukāmatāchando
anya-e0102n0:59_6: samādhinā ekato niyuttova iddhilābhāya saṁvattati; tathā vīriyādayo. Tasmā imāni
anya-e0102n0:60_0: 384.Soḷasa mūlānīti soḷasahi ākārehi āneñjatā cittassa veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṁ – “iddhiyā
anya-e0102n0:60_1: kati mūlāni? Soḷasa mūlāni – anonataṁ cittaṁ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, anunnataṁ
anya-e0102n0:60_2: cittaṁ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, anabhinataṁ cittaṁ rāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:60_3: anapanataṁ cittaṁ byāpāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, anissitaṁ cittaṁ diṭṭhiyā na iñjatīti
anya-e0102n0:60_4: āneñjaṁ, appaṭibaddhaṁ cittaṁ chandarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, vippamuttaṁ cittaṁ
anya-e0102n0:60_5: kāmarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, visaṁyuttaṁ cittaṁ kilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, vimariyādikataṁ
anya-e0102n0:60_6: cittaṁ kilesamariyāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, ekattagataṁ cittaṁ nānattakilese na iñjatīti
anya-e0102n0:60_7: āneñjaṁ, saddhāya pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ assaddhiye na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, vīriyena pariggahitaṁ
anya-e0102n0:60_8: cittaṁ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, satiyā pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ pamāde na iñjatīti
anya-e0102n0:60_9: āneñjaṁ, samādhinā pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, paññāya pariggahitaṁ
anya-e0102n0:60_10: cittaṁ avijjāya na iñjatīti āneñjaṁ, obhāsagataṁ cittaṁ avijjandhakāre na iñjatīti
anya-e0102n0:60_11: āneñjaṁ. Iddhiyā imāni soḷasa mūlāni iddhilābhāya…pe… iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:61_0: Kāmañca esa attho evaṁ samāhite cittetiādināpi siddhoyeva, paṭhamajjhānādīnaṁ pana
anya-e0102n0:61_1: iddhiyā bhūmipādapadamūlabhāvadassanatthaṁ puna vutto. Purimo ca suttesu āgatanayo.
anya-e0102n0:61_2: Ayaṁ paṭisambhidāyaṁ. Iti ubhayattha asammohatthampi puna vutto.
anya-e0102n0:62_0: 385.Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahantoti svāyamete iddhiyā bhūmipādapadabhūte dhamme sampādetvā
anya-e0102n0:62_1: abhiññāpādakaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace sataṁ icchati “sataṁ homi sataṁ
anya-e0102n0:62_2: homī”ti parikammaṁ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n0:62_3: adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva sataṁ hoti. Sahassādīsupi eseva nayo. Sace evaṁ na ijjhati
anya-e0102n0:62_4: puna parikammaṁ katvā dutiyampi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Saṁyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0102n0:62_5: hi ekavāraṁ dvevāraṁ samāpajjituṁ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṁ. Tattha pādakajjhānacittaṁ nimittārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:62_6: Parikammacittāni satārammaṇāni vā sahassārammaṇāni vā, tāni ca kho vaṇṇavasena, no
anya-e0102n0:62_7: paṇṇattivasena. Adhiṭṭhānacittampi tatheva satārammaṇaṁ vā sahassārammaṇaṁ vā. Taṁ
anya-e0102n0:62_8: pubbe vuttaṁ appanācittamiva gotrabhuanantaraṁ ekameva uppajjati rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:63_0: 386. Yampi paṭisambhidāyaṁ vuttaṁ “pakatiyā eko bahukaṁ āvajjati sataṁ vā sahassaṁ
anya-e0102n0:63_1: vā satasahassaṁ vā, āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti ‘bahuko homī’ti, bahuko hoti, yathā
anya-e0102n0:63_2: āyasmā cūḷapanthako”ti. Tatrāpi āvajjatīti parikammavaseneva vuttaṁ. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena
anya-e0102n0:63_3: adhiṭṭhātīti abhiññāñāṇavasena vuttaṁ. Tasmā bahukaṁ āvajjati, tato tesampi parikammacittānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:63_4: avasāne samāpajjati, samāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā puna bahuko homīti āvajjitvā tato paraṁ
anya-e0102n0:63_5: pavattānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ catunnaṁ vā pubbabhāgacittānaṁ anantarā uppannena sanniṭṭhāpanavasena
anya-e0102n0:63_6: adhiṭṭhānanti laddhanāmena ekeneva abhiññāñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n0:64_0: Yaṁ pana vuttaṁ “yathā āyasmā cūḷapanthako”ti, taṁ bahudhābhāvassa kāyasakkhidassanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n0:64_1: vuttaṁ. Taṁ pana vatthunā dīpetabbaṁ. Te kira dvebhātaro panthe jātattā panthakāti
anya-e0102n0:64_2: nāmaṁ labhiṁsu. Tesaṁ jeṭṭho mahāpanthako, so pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ
anya-e0102n0:65: Padumaṁ yathā kokanadaṁ sugandhaṁ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṁ;
anya-e0102n0:67_0: Imaṁ gāthaṁ adāsi. So taṁ catūhi māsehi paguṇaṁ kātuṁ nāsakkhi. Atha naṁ thero abhabbo
anya-e0102n0:67_1: tvaṁ sāsaneti vihārato nīhari. Tasmiñca kāle thero bhattuddesako hoti. Jīvako theraṁ
anya-e0102n0:67_2: upasaṅkamitvā “sve, bhante, bhagavatā saddhiṁ pañcabhikkhusatāni gahetvā amhākaṁ
anya-e0102n0:67_3: gehe bhikkhaṁ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Theropi ṭhapetvā cūḷapanthakaṁ sesānaṁ adhivāsemīti adhivāsesi.
anya-e0102n0:68_0: Cūḷapanthako dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā rodati. Bhagavā dibbacakkhunā disvā taṁ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0102n0:68_1: kasmā rodasīti āha. So taṁ pavattimācikkhi. Bhagavā na sajjhāyaṁ kātuṁ asakkonto
anya-e0102n0:68_2: mama sāsane abhabbo nāma hoti, mā soci bhikkhūti taṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā vihāraṁ pavisitvā
anya-e0102n0:68_3: iddhiyā pilotikakhaṇḍaṁ abhinimminitvā adāsi, handa bhikkhu imaṁ parimajjanto rajoharaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n0:68_4: rajoharaṇanti punappunaṁ sajjhāyaṁ karohīti. Tassa tathā karoto taṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ ahosi.
anya-e0102n0:68_5: So parisuddhaṁ vatthaṁ, natthettha doso, attabhāvassa panāyaṁ dosoti saññaṁ paṭilabhitvā
anya-e0102n0:68_6: pañcasu khandhesu ñāṇaṁ otāretvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā anulomato gotrabhusamīpaṁ pāpesi.
anya-e0102n0:69: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
anya-e0102n0:74: “Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
anya-e0102n0:78: Tassa gāthāpariyosāne catupaṭisambhidāchaḷabhiññāparivārā nava lokuttaradhammā hatthagatāva ahesuṁ.
anya-e0102n0:79_0: Satthā dutiyadivase jīvakassa gehaṁ agamāsi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena. Atha dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
anya-e0102n0:79_1: yāguyā diyyamānāya hatthena pattaṁ pidahi. Jīvako kiṁ bhanteti pucchi. Vihāre eko
anya-e0102n0:79_2: bhikkhu atthīti. So purisaṁ pesesi “gaccha, ayyaṁ gahetvā sīghaṁ ehī”ti. Vihārato
anya-e0102n0:82_0: Atha so puriso gantvā kāsāvehi ekapajjotaṁ ārāmaṁ disvā āgantvā bhikkhūhi bharito
anya-e0102n0:82_1: bhante ārāmo, nāhaṁ jānāmi katamo so ayyoti āha. Tato naṁ bhagavā āha “gaccha yaṁ
anya-e0102n0:82_2: paṭhamaṁ passasi, taṁ cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā ‘satthā taṁ āmantetī’ti vatvā ānehī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:82_3: So taṁ gantvā therasseva cīvarakaṇṇe aggahesi. Tāvadeva sabbepi nimmitā antaradhāyiṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:82_4: Thero “gaccha tva”nti taṁ uyyojetvā mukhadhovanādisarīrakiccaṁ niṭṭhapetvā paṭhamataraṁ
anya-e0102n0:82_5: gantvā pattāsane nisīdi. Idaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “yathā āyasmā cūḷapanthako”ti.
anya-e0102n0:83_0: Tatra ye te bahū nimmitā te aniyametvā nimmitattā iddhimatā sadisāva honti. Ṭhānanisajjādīsu
anya-e0102n0:83_1: vā bhāsitatuṇhībhāvādīsu vā yaṁ yaṁ iddhimā karoti, taṁ tadeva karonti. Sace pana
anya-e0102n0:83_2: nānāvaṇṇe kātukāmo hoti, keci paṭhamavaye, keci majjhimavaye, keci pacchimavaye,
anya-e0102n0:83_3: tathā dīghakese, upaḍḍhamuṇḍe, muṇḍe, missakese, upaḍḍharattacīvare, paṇḍukacīvare,
anya-e0102n0:83_5: karonte aparepi vā nānappakārake kātukāmo hoti, tena pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya ettakā
anya-e0102n0:83_6: bhikkhū paṭhamavayā hontūtiādinā nayena parikammaṁ katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n0:83_7: adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Adhiṭṭhānacittena saddhiṁ icchiticchitappakārāyeva hontīti. Esa nayo
anya-e0102n0:84_0: Ayaṁ pana viseso, iminā bhikkhunā evaṁ bahubhāvaṁ nimminitvā puna “ekova hutvā caṅkamissāmi,
anya-e0102n0:84_1: sajjhāyaṁ karissāmi, pañhaṁ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā vā, “ayaṁ vihāro appabhikkhuko,
anya-e0102n0:84_2: sace keci āgamissanti ‘kuto ime ettakā ekasadisā bhikkhū, addhā therassa esa ānubhāvo’ti
anya-e0102n0:84_3: maṁ jānissantī”ti appicchatāya vā antarāva “eko homī”ti icchantena pādakajjhānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:84_4: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “eko homī”ti parikammaṁ katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “eko
anya-e0102n0:84_5: homī”ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Adhiṭṭhānacittena saddhiṁyeva eko hoti. Evaṁ akaronto pana
anya-e0102n0:85_0: 387.Āvibhāvaṁ tirobhāvanti ettha āvibhāvaṁ karoti tirobhāvaṁ karotīti ayamattho.
anya-e0102n0:85_1: Idameva hi sandhāya paṭisambhidāyaṁ vuttaṁ “āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṁ hoti appaṭicchannaṁ
anya-e0102n0:85_2: vivaṭaṁ pākaṭaṁ. Tirobhāvanti kenaci āvaṭaṁ hoti paṭicchannaṁ pihitaṁ paṭikujjita”nti.
anya-e0102n0:85_3: Tatrāyaṁ iddhimā āvibhāvaṁ kātukāmo andhakāraṁ vā ālokaṁ karoti, paṭicchannaṁ vā
anya-e0102n0:85_4: vivaṭaṁ, anāpāthaṁ vā āpāthaṁ karoti. Kathaṁ? Ayañhi yathā paṭicchannopi dūre ṭhitopi
anya-e0102n0:85_5: vā dissati, evaṁ attānaṁ vā paraṁ vā kātukāmo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya idaṁ andhakāraṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:85_6: ālokajātaṁ hotūti vā, idaṁ paṭicchannaṁ vivaṭaṁ hotūti vā, idaṁ anāpāthaṁ āpāthaṁ
anya-e0102n0:85_7: hotūti vā āvajjitvā parikammaṁ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti, saha adhiṭṭhānacittena
anya-e0102n0:85_8: yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti. Pare dūre ṭhitāpi passanti. Sayampi passitukāmo passati.
anya-e0102n0:86_0: 388. Etaṁ pana pāṭihāriyaṁ kena katapubbanti? Bhagavatā. Bhagavā hi cūḷasubhaddāya
anya-e0102n0:86_1: nimantito vissakammunā nimmitehi pañcahi kūṭāgārasatehi sāvatthito sattayojanabbhantaraṁ
anya-e0102n0:86_2: sāketaṁ gacchanto yathā sāketanagaravāsino sāvatthivāsike, sāvatthivāsino ca sāketavāsike
anya-e0102n0:86_3: passanti, evaṁ adhiṭṭhāsi. Nagaramajjhe ca otaritvā pathaviṁ dvidhā bhinditvā yāva
anya-e0102n0:86_4: avīciṁ ākāsañca dvidhā viyūhitvā yāva brahmalokaṁ dassesi.
anya-e0102n0:87_0: Devorohaṇenapi ca ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Bhagavā kira yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ katvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni
anya-e0102n0:87_1: bandhanā pamocetvā atītā buddhā yamakapāṭihāriyāvasāne kuhiṁ gatāti āvajjitvā tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ
anya-e0102n0:87_2: gatāti addasa. Athekena pādena pathavītalaṁ akkamitvā dutiyaṁ yugandharapabbate patiṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0102n0:87_3: puna purimapādaṁ uddharitvā sinerumatthakaṁ akkamitvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilātale
anya-e0102n0:87_4: vassaṁ upagantvā sannipatitānaṁ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṁ ādito paṭṭhāya abhidhammakathaṁ
anya-e0102n0:87_5: ārabhi. Bhikkhācāravelāya nimmitabuddhaṁ māpesi. So dhammaṁ deseti. Bhagavā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0102n0:87_6: khāditvā anotattadahe mukhaṁ dhovitvā uttarakurūsu piṇḍapātaṁ gahetvā anotattadahatīre
anya-e0102n0:87_7: paribhuñjati. Sāriputtatthero tattha gantvā bhagavantaṁ vandati. Bhagavā ajja ettakaṁ
anya-e0102n0:87_8: dhammaṁ desesinti therassa nayaṁ deti. Evaṁ tayo māse abbocchinnaṁ abhidhammakathaṁ
anya-e0102n0:87_9: kathesi. Taṁ sutvā asītikoṭidevatānaṁ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0102n0:88_0: Yamakapāṭihāriye sannipatitāpi dvādasayojanā parisā bhagavantaṁ passitvāva gamissāmāti
anya-e0102n0:88_1: khandhāvāraṁ bandhitvā aṭṭhāsi. Taṁ cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhiyeva sabbapaccayehi upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n0:88_2: Manussā kuhiṁ bhagavāti jānanatthāya anuruddhattheraṁ yāciṁsu. Thero ālokaṁ vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0102n0:88_3: addasa dibbena cakkhunā tattha vassūpagataṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā ārocesi.
anya-e0102n0:89_0: Te bhagavato vandanatthāya mahāmoggallānattheraṁ yāciṁsu. Thero parisamajjheyeva
anya-e0102n0:89_1: mahāpathaviyaṁ nimujjitvā sinerupabbataṁ nibbijjhitvā tathāgatapādamūle bhagavato
anya-e0102n0:89_2: pāde vandamānova ummujjitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “jambudīpavāsino, bhante, bhagavato
anya-e0102n0:89_3: pāde vanditvā passitvāva gamissāmāti vadantī”ti. Bhagavā āha “kuhiṁ pana te, moggallāna,
anya-e0102n0:89_5: daṭṭhukāmā sve saṅkassanagaraṁ āgacchantu, ahaṁ sve mahāpavāraṇapuṇṇamāsīuposathadivase
anya-e0102n0:89_6: saṅkassanagare otarissāmī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti thero dasabalaṁ vanditvā āgatamaggeneva
anya-e0102n0:89_7: oruyha manussānaṁ santikaṁ sampāpuṇi. Gamanāgamanakāle ca yathā naṁ manussā passanti,
anya-e0102n0:89_8: evaṁ adhiṭṭhāsi. Idaṁ tāvettha mahāmoggallānatthero āvibhāvapāṭihāriyaṁ akāsi.
anya-e0102n0:90_0: So evaṁ āgato taṁ pavattiṁ ārocetvā “dūranti saññaṁ akatvā katapātarāsāva nikkhamathā”ti
anya-e0102n0:90_1: āha. Bhagavā sakkassa devarañño ārocesi “mahārāja, sve manussalokaṁ gacchāmī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:90_2: Devarājā vissakammaṁ āṇāpesi “tāta, sve bhagavā manussalokaṁ gantukāmo, tisso sopānapantiyo
anya-e0102n0:90_3: māpehi ekaṁ kanakamayaṁ, ekaṁ rajatamayaṁ, ekaṁ maṇimaya”nti. So tathā akāsi. Bhagavā
anya-e0102n0:90_4: dutiyadivase sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā puratthimalokadhātuṁ olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni
anya-e0102n0:90_5: vivaṭāni hutvā ekaṅgaṇaṁ viya pakāsiṁsu. Yathā ca puratthimena, evaṁ pacchimenapi
anya-e0102n0:90_6: uttarenapi dakkhiṇenapi sabbaṁ vivaṭamaddasa. Heṭṭhāpi yāva avīci, upari yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanaṁ, tāva addasa.
anya-e0102n0:91_0: Taṁ divasaṁ kira lokavivaraṇaṁ nāma ahosi. Manussāpi deve passanti, devāpi manusse.
anya-e0102n0:91_1: Tattha neva manussā uddhaṁ ullokenti, na devā adho olokenti, sabbe sammukhāva aññamaññaṁ
anya-e0102n0:91_2: passanti. Bhagavā majjhe maṇimayena sopānena otarati, chakāmāvacaradevā vāmapasse
anya-e0102n0:91_3: kanakamayena, suddhāvāsā ca mahābrahmā ca dakkhiṇapasse rajatamayena. Devarājā pattacīvaraṁ
anya-e0102n0:91_4: aggahesi, mahābrahmā tiyojanikaṁ setacchattaṁ, suyāmo vāḷabījaniṁ, pañcasikho gandhabbaputto
anya-e0102n0:91_5: tigāvutamattaṁ beḷuvapaṇḍuvīṇaṁ gahetvā tathāgatassa pūjaṁ karonto otarati. Taṁdivasaṁ
anya-e0102n0:91_6: bhagavantaṁ disvā buddhabhāvāya pihaṁ anuppādetvā ṭhitasatto nāma natthi. Idamettha
anya-e0102n0:92_0: Apica tambapaṇṇidīpe talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnattheropi tissamahāvihāre cetiyaṅgaṇasmiṁ
anya-e0102n0:92_1: nisīditvā “tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno
anya-e0102n0:92_2: hotī”ti apaṇṇakasuttaṁ kathento heṭṭhāmukhaṁ bījaniṁ akāsi, yāva avīcito ekaṅgaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n0:92_3: ahosi. Tato uparimukhaṁ akāsi, yāva brahmalokā ekaṅgaṇaṁ ahosi. Thero nirayabhayena
anya-e0102n0:92_4: tajjetvā saggasukhena ca palobhetvā dhammaṁ desesi. Keci sotāpannā ahesuṁ, keci sakadāgāmī anāgāmī arahantoti.
anya-e0102n0:93_0: 389. Tirobhāvaṁ kātukāmo pana ālokaṁ vā andhakāraṁ karoti, appaṭicchannaṁ vā paṭicchannaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:93_1: āpāthaṁ vā anāpāthaṁ karoti. Kathaṁ? Ayañhi yathā appaṭicchannopi samīpe ṭhitopi
anya-e0102n0:93_2: vā na dissati, evaṁ attānaṁ vā paraṁ vā kātukāmo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “idaṁ ālokaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:93_3: andhakāraṁ hotū”ti vā, “idaṁ appaṭicchannaṁ paṭicchannaṁ hotū”ti vā, “idaṁ āpāthaṁ
anya-e0102n0:93_4: anāpāthaṁ hotū”ti vā āvajjitvā parikammaṁ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti. Saha adhiṭṭhānacittena
anya-e0102n0:93_5: yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti. Pare samīpe ṭhitāpi na passanti. Sayampi apassitukāmo na passati.
anya-e0102n0:94_0: 390. Etaṁ pana pāṭihāriyaṁ kena katapubbanti? Bhagavatā. Bhagavā hi yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ
anya-e0102n0:94_1: samīpe nisinnaṁyeva yathā naṁ pitā na passati, evamakāsi. Tathā vīsayojanasataṁ mahākappinassa
anya-e0102n0:94_2: paccuggamanaṁ katvā taṁ anāgāmiphale, amaccasahassañcassa sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā,
anya-e0102n0:94_3: tassa anumaggaṁ āgatā sahassitthiparivārā anojādevī āgantvā samīpe nisinnāpi yathā
anya-e0102n0:94_4: saparisaṁ rājānaṁ na passati, tathā katvā “api, bhante, rājānaṁ passathā”ti vutte
anya-e0102n0:94_5: “kiṁ pana te rājānaṁ gavesituṁ varaṁ, udāhu attāna”nti? “Attānaṁ, bhante”ti vatvā
anya-e0102n0:94_6: nisinnāya tassā tathā dhammaṁ desesi, yathā sā saddhiṁ itthisahassena sotāpattiphale
anya-e0102n0:94_7: patiṭṭhāsi, amaccā anāgāmiphale, rājā arahatteti. Apica tambapaṇṇidīpaṁ āgatadivase
anya-e0102n0:94_8: yathā attanā saddhiṁ āgate avasese rājā na passati, evaṁ karontena mahindattherenāpi idaṁ katameva.
anya-e0102n0:95_0: 391. Apica sabbampi pākaṭaṁ pāṭihāriyaṁ āvibhāvaṁ nāma. Apākaṭapāṭihāriyaṁ tirobhāvaṁ
anya-e0102n0:95_1: nāma. Tattha pākaṭapāṭihāriye iddhipi paññāyati iddhimāpi. Taṁ yamakapāṭihāriyena
anya-e0102n0:95_2: dīpetabbaṁ. Tatra hi “idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ karoti asādhāraṇaṁ sāvakehi.
anya-e0102n0:95_3: Uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattatī”ti evaṁ
anya-e0102n0:95_4: ubhayaṁ paññāyittha. Apākaṭapāṭihāriye iddhiyeva paññāyati, na iddhimā. Taṁ mahakasuttena
anya-e0102n0:95_5: ca brahmanimantanikasuttena ca dīpetabbaṁ. Tatra hi āyasmato ca mahakassa, bhagavato
anya-e0102n0:97_0: “Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṁ mahakaṁ etadavoca ‘sādhu me, bhante,
anya-e0102n0:97_1: ayyo mahako uttarimanussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ dassetū’ti. Tena hi tvaṁ gahapati
anya-e0102n0:97_2: āḷinde uttarāsaṅgaṁ paññāpetvā tiṇakalāpaṁ okāsehīti. ‘Evaṁ, bhante’ti kho citto
anya-e0102n0:97_3: gahapati āyasmato mahakassa paṭissutvā āḷinde uttarāsaṅgaṁ paññāpetvā tiṇakalāpaṁ
anya-e0102n0:97_4: okāsesi. Atha kho āyasmā mahako vihāraṁ pavisitvā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi,
anya-e0102n0:97_5: yathā tālacchiggaḷena ca aggaḷantarikāya ca acci nikkhamitvā tiṇāni jhāpesi, uttarāsaṅgaṁ na jhāpesī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:99_0: “Atha khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsiṁ ‘ettāvatā brahmā
anya-e0102n0:99_1: ca brahmaparisā ca brahmapārisajjā ca saddañca me sossanti, na ca maṁ dakkhissantī’ti
anya-e0102n0:101: Bhavaṁ nābhivadiṁ kiñci, nandiñca na upādiyi”’nti. ;
anya-e0102n0:102_0: 392. Tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāseti ettha
anya-e0102n0:102_1: tirokuṭṭanti parakuṭṭaṁ, kuṭṭassa parabhāganti vuttaṁ hoti. Esa nayo itaresu. Kuṭṭoti
anya-e0102n0:102_2: ca gehabhittiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Pākāroti gehavihāragāmādīnaṁ parikkhepapākāro. Pabbatoti
anya-e0102n0:102_3: paṁsupabbato vā pāsāṇapabbato vā. Asajjamānoti alaggamāno. Seyyathāpi ākāseti ākāse
anya-e0102n0:102_4: viya. Evaṁ gantukāmena pana ākāsakasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya kuṭṭaṁ vā pākāraṁ
anya-e0102n0:102_5: vā sinerucakkavāḷesupi aññataraṁ pabbataṁ vā āvajjitvā kataparikammena ākāso hotūti
anya-e0102n0:102_6: adhiṭṭhātabbo. Ākāsoyeva hoti. Adho otaritukāmassa, uddhaṁ vā ārohitukāmassa susiro
anya-e0102n0:102_7: hoti, vinivijjhitvā gantukāmassa chiddo. So tattha asajjamāno gacchati.
anya-e0102n0:103_1: kiṁ hatthiassādīni abhinimminitukāmo hatthiassādi kasiṇāni samāpajjati, nanu yattha
anya-e0102n0:103_2: katthaci kasiṇe parikammaṁ katvā aṭṭhasamāpattivasībhāvoyeva pamāṇaṁ. Yaṁ yaṁ icchati,
anya-e0102n0:103_3: taṁ tadeva hotī”ti. Bhikkhū āhaṁsu – “pāḷiyā, bhante, ākāsakasiṇaṁyeva āgataṁ, tasmā
anya-e0102n0:104_0: “Pakatiyā ākāsakasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti. Tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ
anya-e0102n0:104_1: āvajjati. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti – ‘ākāso hotū’ti. Ākāso hoti. Tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ
anya-e0102n0:104_2: tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati. Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kenaci anāvaṭe
anya-e0102n0:104_3: aparikkhitte asajjamānā gacchanti, evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ
anya-e0102n0:105_0: Sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassa antarā pabbato vā rukkho vā uṭṭheti,
anya-e0102n0:105_1: kiṁ puna samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti? Doso natthi. Puna samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:105_2: hi upajjhāyassa santike nissayaggahaṇasadisaṁ hoti. Iminā ca pana bhikkhunā ākāso
anya-e0102n0:105_3: hotūti adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyeva. Purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā añño pabbato
anya-e0102n0:105_4: vā rukkho vā utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānamevetaṁ. Aññena iddhimatā nimmite pana
anya-e0102n0:105_5: paṭhamanimmānaṁ balavaṁ hoti. Itarena tassa uddhaṁ vā adho vā gantabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:106_0: 393.Pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjanti ettha ummujjanti uṭṭhānaṁ vuccati. Nimujjanti saṁsīdanaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:106_1: Ummujjañca nimujjañca ummujjanimujjaṁ. Evaṁ kātukāmena āpokasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n0:106_2: ettake ṭhāne pathavī udakaṁ hotūti paricchinditvā parikammaṁ katvā vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n0:106_3: adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Saha adhiṭṭhānena yathā paricchinne ṭhāne pathavī udakameva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:106_4: So tattha ummujjanimujjaṁ karoti. Tatrāyaṁ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n0:107_0: “Pakatiyā āpokasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti. Pathaviṁ āvajjati. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti
anya-e0102n0:107_1: – ‘udakaṁ hotū’ti. Udakaṁ hoti. So pathaviyā ummujjanimujjaṁ karoti. Yathā manussā
anya-e0102n0:107_2: pakatiyā aniddhimanto udake ummujjanimujjaṁ karonti, evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto
anya-e0102n0:108_0: Na kevalañca ummujjanimujjameva, nhānapānamukhadhovanabhaṇḍakadhovanādīsu yaṁ yaṁ
anya-e0102n0:108_1: icchati, taṁ taṁ karoti. Na kevalañca udakameva, sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīsupi yaṁ
anya-e0102n0:108_2: yaṁ icchati, taṁ taṁ idañcidañca ettakaṁ hotūti āvajjitvā parikammaṁ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa
anya-e0102n0:108_3: yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti. Uddharitvā bhājanagataṁ karontassa sappi sappimeva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:108_4: Telādīni telādīniyeva. Udakaṁ udakameva. So tattha temitukāmova temeti, na temitukāmo
anya-e0102n0:108_5: na temeti. Tasseva ca sā pathavī udakaṁ hoti sesajanassa pathavīyeva. Tattha manussā
anya-e0102n0:108_6: pattikāpi gacchanti, yānādīhipi gacchanti, kasikammādīnipi karontiyeva. Sace panāyaṁ
anya-e0102n0:108_7: tesampi udakaṁ hotūti icchati, hotiyeva. Paricchinnakālaṁ pana atikkamitvā yaṁ pakatiyā
anya-e0102n0:108_8: ghaṭataḷākādīsu udakaṁ, taṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ paricchinnaṭṭhānaṁ pathavīyeva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:109_0: 394.Udakepi abhijjamāneti ettha yaṁ udakaṁ akkamitvā saṁsīdati, taṁ bhijjamānanti
anya-e0102n0:109_1: vuccati. Viparītaṁ abhijjamānaṁ. Evaṁ gantukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0102n0:109_2: vuṭṭhāya ettake ṭhāne udakaṁ pathavī hotūti paricchinditvā parikammaṁ katvā vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n0:109_3: adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Saha adhiṭṭhānena yathā paricchinnaṭṭhāne udakaṁ pathavīyeva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:110_0: “Pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti. Udakaṁ āvajjati. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena
anya-e0102n0:110_1: adhiṭṭhāti – ‘pathavī hotū’ti. Pathavī hoti. So abhijjamāne udake gacchati. Yathā
anya-e0102n0:110_2: manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto abhijjamānāya pathaviyā gacchanti, evameva so iddhimā
anya-e0102n0:110_3: cetovasippatto abhijjamāne udake gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviya”nti.
anya-e0102n0:111_0: Na kevalañca gacchati, yaṁ yaṁ iriyāpathaṁ icchati, taṁ taṁ karoti. Na kevalañca
anya-e0102n0:111_1: pathavimeva karoti, maṇisuvaṇṇapabbatarukkhādīsupi yaṁ yaṁ icchati, taṁ taṁ vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n0:111_2: āvajjitvā adhiṭṭhāti, yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti. Tasseva ca taṁ udakaṁ pathavī hoti,
anya-e0102n0:111_3: sesajanassa udakameva, macchakacchapā ca udakakākādayo ca yathāruci vicaranti. Sace
anya-e0102n0:111_4: panāyaṁ aññesampi manussānaṁ taṁ pathaviṁ kātuṁ icchati, karotiyeva. Paricchinnakālātikkamena
anya-e0102n0:112_0: 395.Pallaṅkena kamatīti pallaṅkena gacchati. Pakkhī sakuṇoti pakkhehi yuttasakuṇo.
anya-e0102n0:112_1: Evaṁ kātukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace nisinno gantumicchati,
anya-e0102n0:112_2: pallaṅkappamāṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ paricchinditvā parikammaṁ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:112_3: Sace nipanno gantukāmo hoti mañcappamāṇaṁ, sace padasā gantukāmo hoti maggappamāṇanti
anya-e0102n0:112_4: evaṁ yathānurūpaṁ ṭhānaṁ paricchinditvā vuttanayeneva pathavī hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:112_5: saha adhiṭṭhānena pathavīyeva hoti. Tatrāyaṁ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n0:113_0: “Ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇoti. Pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā
anya-e0102n0:113_1: lābhī hoti, ākāsaṁ āvajjati. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti – ‘pathavī hotū’ti. Pathavī
anya-e0102n0:113_2: hoti. So ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti. Yathā
anya-e0102n0:113_3: manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto pathaviyaṁ caṅkamantipi…pe… seyyampi kappenti, evameva
anya-e0102n0:113_4: so iddhimā cetovasippatto ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi…pe… seyyampi kappetī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:114_0: Ākāse gantukāmena ca bhikkhunā dibbacakkhulābhināpi bhavitabbaṁ. Kasmā? Antare utusamuṭṭhānā
anya-e0102n0:114_1: vā pabbatarukkhādayo honti, nāgasupaṇṇādayo vā usūyantā māpenti, nesaṁ dassanatthaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:114_2: Te pana disvā kiṁ kātabbanti? Pādakajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ākāso hotūti parikammaṁ
anya-e0102n0:114_3: katvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Thero panāha “samāpattisamāpajjanaṁ, āvuso, kimatthiyaṁ, nanu
anya-e0102n0:114_4: samāhitamevassa cittaṁ, tena yaṁ yaṁ ṭhānaṁ ākāso hotūti adhiṭṭhāti, ākāsoyeva hotī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:114_5: Kiñcāpi evamāha, atha kho tirokuṭṭapārihāriye vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:115_0: Apica okāse orohaṇatthampi iminā dibbacakkhulābhinā bhavitabbaṁ, ayañhi sace anokāse
anya-e0102n0:115_1: nhānatitthe vā gāmadvāre vā orohati. Mahājanassa pākaṭo hoti. Tasmā dibbacakkhunā
anya-e0102n0:116_0: 396. Imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjatīti
anya-e0102n0:116_1: ettha candimasūriyānaṁ dvācattālīsayojanasahassassa upari caraṇena mahiddhikatā,
anya-e0102n0:116_2: tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā. Evaṁ upari caraṇaālokakaraṇehi
anya-e0102n0:116_3: vā mahiddhike teneva mahānubhāve. Parāmasatīti pariggaṇhati ekadese vā chupati. Parimajjatīti
anya-e0102n0:116_4: samantato ādāsatalaṁ viya parimajjati. Ayaṁ panassa iddhi abhiññāpādakajjhānavaseneva
anya-e0102n0:117_0: “Imepi candimasūriye…pe… parimajjatīti idha so iddhimā cetovasippatto candimasūriye
anya-e0102n0:117_1: āvajjati, āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti – ‘hatthapāse hotū’ti. Hatthapāse hoti. So
anya-e0102n0:117_2: nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati. Yathā
anya-e0102n0:117_3: manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kiñcideva rūpagataṁ hatthapāse āmasanti parāmasanti
anya-e0102n0:118_0: Svāyaṁ yadi icchati gantvā parāmasituṁ, gantvā parāmasati, yadi pana idheva nisinnako
anya-e0102n0:118_1: vā nipannako vā parāmasitukāmo hoti, hatthapāse hotūti adhiṭṭhāti, adhiṭṭhānabalena
anya-e0102n0:118_2: vaṇṭā muttatālaphalaṁ viya āgantvā hatthapāse ṭhite vā parāmasati, hatthaṁ vā vaḍḍhetvā.
anya-e0102n0:118_3: Vaḍḍhentassa pana kiṁ upādiṇṇakaṁ vaḍḍhati, anupādiṇṇakanti? Upādiṇṇakaṁ nissāya
anya-e0102n0:119_0: Tattha tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āha “kiṁ panāvuso, upādiṇṇakaṁ khuddakampi mahantampi
anya-e0102n0:119_1: na hoti, nanu yadā bhikkhu tālacchiddādīhi nikkhamati, tadā upādiṇṇakaṁ khuddakaṁ
anya-e0102n0:119_2: hoti. Yadā mahantaṁ attabhāvaṁ karoti, tadā mahantaṁ hoti mahāmoggallānattherassa viyā”ti.
anya-e0102n0:121_0: Ekasmiṁ kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṁ sutvā “sve, bhante,
anya-e0102n0:121_1: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṁ amhākaṁ gehe bhikkhaṁ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā pakkami.
anya-e0102n0:121_2: Bhagavā adhivāsetvā taṁdivasāvasesaṁ rattibhāgañca vītināmetvā paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṁ
anya-e0102n0:121_3: olokesi. Athassa nandopanando nāma nāgarājā ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchi. Bhagavā “ayaṁ
anya-e0102n0:121_4: nāgarājā mayhaṁ ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchi, atthi nu kho assa upanissayo”ti āvajjento
anya-e0102n0:121_5: “ayaṁ micchādiṭṭhiko tīsu ratanesu appasannoti disvā ko nu kho imaṁ micchādiṭṭhito
anya-e0102n0:122_0: Tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṁ katvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi – “ānanda,
anya-e0102n0:122_1: pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ ārocehi tathāgato devacārikaṁ gacchatī”ti. Taṁ divasañca
anya-e0102n0:122_2: nandopanandassa āpānabhūmiṁ sajjayiṁsu. So dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena setacchattena
anya-e0102n0:122_3: dhāriyamānena tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto dibbabhājanesu upaṭṭhāpitaṁ
anya-e0102n0:122_4: annapānavidhiṁ olokayamāno nisinno hoti. Atha bhagavā yathā nāgarājā passati, tathā
anya-e0102n0:122_5: katvā tassa vitānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṁ tāvatiṁsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.
anya-e0102n0:123_0: Tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ
anya-e0102n0:123_1: hoti – “ime hi nāma muṇḍakā samaṇakā amhākaṁ uparūparibhavanena devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:123_2: bhavanaṁ pavisantipi nikkhamantipi, na dāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṁ amhākaṁ matthake
anya-e0102n0:123_3: pādapaṁsuṁ okirantānaṁ gantuṁ dassāmī”ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṁ gantvā taṁ attabhāvaṁ
anya-e0102n0:123_4: vijahitvā sineruṁ sattakkhattuṁ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṁ katvā tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ
anya-e0102n0:124_0: Atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “pubbe, bhante, imasmiṁ padese ṭhito
anya-e0102n0:124_1: sineruṁ passāmi, sineruparibhaṇḍaṁ passāmi, tāvatiṁsaṁ passāmi, vejayantaṁ passāmi,
anya-e0102n0:124_2: vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṁ passāmi. Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0102n0:124_3: yaṁ etarahi neva sineruṁ passāmi…pe… na vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṁ passāmī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:124_4: “Ayaṁ, raṭṭhapāla, nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṁ kupito sineruṁ sattakkhattuṁ
anya-e0102n0:124_5: bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṁ katvā ṭhito”ti. “Damemi
anya-e0102n0:124_6: naṁ, bhante”ti. Na bhagavā anujāni. Atha kho āyasmā bhaddiyo āyasmā rāhuloti anukkamena
anya-e0102n0:124_7: sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṁsu. Na bhagavā anujāni.
anya-e0102n0:125_0: Avasāne mahāmoggallānatthero “ahaṁ, bhante, damemi na”nti āha. “Damehi moggallānā”ti
anya-e0102n0:125_1: bhagavā anujāni. Thero attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā mahantaṁ nāgarājavaṇṇaṁ abhinimminitvā
anya-e0102n0:125_2: nandopanandaṁ cuddasakkhattuṁ bhogehi parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇamatthake attano phaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n0:125_3: ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṁ abhinippīḷesi. Nāgarājā padhūmāyi. Theropi na tuyhaṁyeva
anya-e0102n0:125_4: sarīre dhūmo atthi, mayhampi atthīti padhūmāyi. Nāgarājassa dhūmo theraṁ na bādhati.
anya-e0102n0:125_5: Therassa pana dhūmo nāgarājānaṁ bādhati. Tato nāgarājā pajjali. Theropi na tuyhaṁyeva
anya-e0102n0:125_6: sarīre aggi atthi, mayhampi atthīti pajjali. Nāgarājassa tejo theraṁ na bādhati.
anya-e0102n0:125_7: Therassa pana tejo nāgarājānaṁ bādhati. Nāgarājā ayaṁ maṁ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā
anya-e0102n0:125_8: dhūmāyati ceva pajjalati cāti cintetvā “bho tvaṁ kosī”ti paṭipucchi. “Ahaṁ kho, nanda,
anya-e0102n0:126_0: Thero taṁ attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena
anya-e0102n0:126_1: nikkhami, vāmakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena nikkhami, tathā dakkhiṇanāsasotena
anya-e0102n0:126_2: pavisitvā vāmanāsasotena nikkhami, vāmanāsasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇanāsasotena nikkhami.
anya-e0102n0:126_3: Tato nāgarājā mukhaṁ vivari. Thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṁ pācīnena ca pacchimena
anya-e0102n0:126_4: ca caṅkamati. Bhagavā “moggallāna, manasikarohi mahiddhiko esa nāgo”ti āha. Thero
anya-e0102n0:126_5: “mayhaṁ kho, bhante, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā
anya-e0102n0:126_6: paricitā susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante, nandopanando, ahaṁ nandopanandasadisānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:126_7: nāgarājānaṁ satampi sahassampi satasahassampi dameyya”nti āha.
anya-e0102n0:127_0: Nāgarājā cintesi “pavisanto tāva me na diṭṭho, nikkhamanakāle dāni naṁ dāṭhantare
anya-e0102n0:127_1: pakkhipitvā saṅkhādissāmī”ti cintetvā nikkhama bhante, mā maṁ antokucchiyaṁ aparāparaṁ
anya-e0102n0:127_2: caṅkamanto bādhayitthāti āha. Thero nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. Nāgarājā ayaṁ soti
anya-e0102n0:127_3: disvā nāsavātaṁ vissajji. Thero catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji. Lomakūpampissa vāto cāletuṁ
anya-e0102n0:127_4: nāsakkhi. Avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṁ sakkuṇeyyuṁ,
anya-e0102n0:127_5: imaṁ pana ṭhānaṁ patvā evaṁ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṁ na sakkhissantīti
anya-e0102n0:128_0: Nāgarājā “ahaṁ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṁ nāsakkhiṁ, mahiddhiko
anya-e0102n0:128_1: samaṇo”ti cintesi. Thero attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṁ abhinimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṁ
anya-e0102n0:128_2: dassento nāgarājānaṁ anubandhi. Nāgarājā taṁ attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṁ
anya-e0102n0:128_3: abhinimminitvā “bhante, tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī”ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi.
anya-e0102n0:128_4: Thero “satthā, nanda, āgato, ehi gamissāmā”ti nāgarājānaṁ damayitvā nibbisaṁ katvā
anya-e0102n0:128_5: gahetvā bhagavato santikaṁ agamāsi. Nāgarājā bhagavantaṁ vanditvā “bhante, tumhākaṁ
anya-e0102n0:128_6: saraṇaṁ gacchāmī”ti āha. Bhagavā “sukhī hohi, nāgarājā”ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
anya-e0102n0:129_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko “kiṁ, bhante, atidivā āgatatthā”ti āha. Moggallānassa ca nandopanandassa
anya-e0102n0:129_1: ca saṅgāmo ahosīti. Kassa, bhante, jayo, kassa parājayoti. Moggallānassa jayo, nandassa
anya-e0102n0:129_2: parājayoti. Anāthapiṇḍiko “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā sattāhaṁ ekapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0102n0:129_3: bhattaṁ, sattāhaṁ therassa sakkāraṁ karissāmī”ti vatvā sattāhaṁ buddhapamukhānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:129_4: pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ mahāsakkāraṁ akāsi. Iti imaṁ imasmiṁ nandopanandadamane
anya-e0102n0:129_5: kataṁ mahantaṁ attabhāvaṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ “yadā mahantaṁ attabhāvaṁ karoti, tadā
anya-e0102n0:129_6: mahantaṁ hoti mahāmoggallānattherassa viyā”ti. Evaṁ vuttepi bhikkhū upādiṇṇakaṁ nissāya
anya-e0102n0:129_7: anupādiṇṇakameva vaḍḍhatīti āhaṁsu. Ayameva cettha yutti.
anya-e0102n0:130_0: So evaṁ katvā na kevalaṁ candimasūriye parāmasati. Sace icchati pādakathalikaṁ katvā
anya-e0102n0:130_1: pāde ṭhapeti, pīṭhaṁ katvā nisīdati, mañcaṁ katvā nipajjati, apassenaphalakaṁ katvā
anya-e0102n0:130_2: apassayati. Yathā ca eko, evaṁ aparopi. Anekesupi hi bhikkhusatasahassesu evaṁ karontesu
anya-e0102n0:130_3: tesañca ekamekassa tatheva ijjhati. Candimasūriyānañca gamanampi ālokakaraṇampi tatheva
anya-e0102n0:130_4: hoti. Yathā hi pātisahassesu udakapūresu sabbapātīsu ca candamaṇḍalāni dissanti.
anya-e0102n0:130_5: Pākatikameva ca candassa gamanaṁ ālokakaraṇañca hoti. Tathūpamametaṁ pāṭihāriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:131_0: 397.Yāva brahmalokāpīti brahmalokampi paricchedaṁ katvā. Kāyena vasaṁ vattetīti tattha
anya-e0102n0:131_1: brahmaloke kāyena attano vasaṁ vatteti. Tassattho pāḷiṁ anugantvā veditabbo. Ayañhettha pāḷi –
anya-e0102n0:132_0: “Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattetīti. Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto brahmalokaṁ
anya-e0102n0:132_1: gantukāmo hoti, dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhāti santike hotūti, santike hoti. Santikepi
anya-e0102n0:132_2: dūre adhiṭṭhāti dūre hotūti, dūre hoti. Bahukampi thokanti adhiṭṭhāti thokaṁ hotūti,
anya-e0102n0:132_3: thokaṁ hoti. Thokampi bahukanti adhiṭṭhāti bahukaṁ hotūti, bahukaṁ hoti. Dibbena
anya-e0102n0:132_4: cakkhunā tassa brahmuno rūpaṁ passati. Dibbāya sotadhātuyā tassa brahmuno saddaṁ
anya-e0102n0:132_5: suṇāti. Cetopariyañāṇena tassa brahmuno cittaṁ pajānāti. Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto
anya-e0102n0:132_6: dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti, kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmeti, kāyavasena
anya-e0102n0:132_7: cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti, kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmetvā kāyavasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0102n0:132_8: sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati. Sace
anya-e0102n0:132_9: so iddhimā cetovasippatto adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti, cittavasena
anya-e0102n0:132_10: kāyaṁ pariṇāmeti, cittavasena kāyaṁ adhiṭṭhāti. Cittavasena kāyaṁ pariṇāmetvā cittavasena
anya-e0102n0:132_11: kāyaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ
anya-e0102n0:132_12: gacchati. So tassa brahmuno purato rūpaṁ abhinimmināti manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapañcaṅgiṁ
anya-e0102n0:132_13: ahīnindriyaṁ. Sace so iddhimā caṅkamati, nimmitopi tattha caṅkamati. Sace so iddhimā
anya-e0102n0:132_14: tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, seyyaṁ kappeti, nimmitopi tattha seyyaṁ kappeti. Sace so iddhimā
anya-e0102n0:132_15: dhūmāyati, pajjalati, dhammaṁ bhāsati, pañhaṁ pucchati, pañhaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeti,
anya-e0102n0:132_16: nimmitopi tattha pañhaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeti. Sace so iddhimā tena brahmunā saddhiṁ
anya-e0102n0:132_17: santiṭṭhati, sallapati, sākacchaṁ samāpajjati, nimmitopi tattha tena brahmunā saddhiṁ
anya-e0102n0:132_18: santiṭṭhati, sallapati, sākacchaṁ samāpajjati. Yaṁ yadeva hi so iddhimā karoti, taṁ
anya-e0102n0:133_0: Tattha dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātīti pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya dūre devalokaṁ vā brahmalokaṁ
anya-e0102n0:133_1: vā āvajjati santike hotūti. Āvajjitvā parikammaṁ katvā puna samāpajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti
anya-e0102n0:133_2: santike hotūti, santike hoti. Esa nayo sesapadesupi.
anya-e0102n0:134_0: Tattha ko dūraṁ gahetvā santikaṁ akāsīti? Bhagavā. Bhagavā hi yamakapāṭihāriyāvasāne
anya-e0102n0:134_1: devalokaṁ gacchanto yugandharañca sineruñca santike katvā pathavītalato ekapādaṁ
anya-e0102n0:134_2: yugandhare patiṭṭhapetvā dutiyaṁ sinerumatthake ṭhapesi. Añño ko akāsi? Mahāmoggallānatthero.
anya-e0102n0:134_3: Thero hi sāvatthito bhattakiccaṁ katvā nikkhantaṁ dvādasayojanikaṁ parisaṁ tiṁsayojanaṁ
anya-e0102n0:135_0: Apica tambapaṇṇidīpe cūḷasamuddattheropi akāsi. Dubbhikkhasamaye kira therassa santikaṁ
anya-e0102n0:135_1: pātova satta bhikkhusatāni āgamaṁsu. Thero “mahā bhikkhusaṅgho kuhiṁ bhikkhācāro
anya-e0102n0:135_2: bhavissatī”ti cintento sakalatambapaṇṇidīpe adisvā “paratīre pāṭaliputte bhavissatī”ti
anya-e0102n0:135_3: disvā bhikkhū pattacīvaraṁ gāhāpetvā “ethāvuso, bhikkhācāraṁ gamissāmā”ti pathaviṁ
anya-e0102n0:135_4: saṅkhipitvā pāṭaliputtaṁ gato. Bhikkhū “kataraṁ, bhante, imaṁ nagara”nti pucchiṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:135_5: Pāṭaliputtaṁ, āvusoti. Pāṭaliputtaṁ nāma dūre bhanteti. Āvuso, mahallakattherā nāma
anya-e0102n0:135_6: dūrepi gahetvā santike karontīti. Mahāsamuddo kuhiṁ, bhanteti? Nanu, āvuso, antarā
anya-e0102n0:135_7: ekaṁ nīlamātikaṁ atikkamitvā āgatatthāti? Āma, bhante. Mahāsamuddo pana mahantoti.
anya-e0102n0:135_8: Āvuso, mahallakattherā nāma mahantampi khuddakaṁ karontīti.
anya-e0102n0:136: Yathā cāyaṁ, evaṁ tissadattattheropi sāyanhasamaye nhāyitvā katuttarāsaṅgo mahābodhiṁ vandissāmīti citte uppanne santike akāsi.
anya-e0102n0:137: Santikaṁ pana gahetvā ko dūramakāsīti? Bhagavā. Bhagavā hi attano ca aṅgulimālassa ca antaraṁ santikampi dūramakāsīti.
anya-e0102n0:138_0: Atha ko bahukaṁ thokaṁ akāsīti? Mahākassapatthero. Rājagahe kira nakkhattadivase
anya-e0102n0:138_1: pañcasatā kumāriyo candapūve gahetvā nakkhattakīḷanatthāya gacchantiyo bhagavantaṁ
anya-e0102n0:138_2: disvā kiñci nādaṁsu. Pacchato āgacchantaṁ pana theraṁ disvā amhākaṁ thero eti pūvaṁ
anya-e0102n0:138_3: dassāmāti sabbā pūve gahetvā theraṁ upasaṅkamiṁsu. Thero pattaṁ nīharitvā sabbaṁ
anya-e0102n0:138_4: ekapattapūramattamakāsi. Bhagavā theraṁ āgamayamāno purato nisīdi. Thero āharitvā bhagavato adāsi.
anya-e0102n0:139_0: Illisaseṭṭhivatthusmiṁ pana mahāmoggallānatthero thokaṁ bahukamakāsi, kākavaliyavatthusmiñca
anya-e0102n0:139_1: bhagavā. Mahākassapatthero kira sattāhaṁ samāpattiyā vītināmetvā daliddasaṅgahaṁ
anya-e0102n0:139_2: karonto kākavaliyassa nāma duggatamanussassa gharadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Tassa jāyā theraṁ
anya-e0102n0:139_3: disvā patino pakkaṁ aloṇambilayāguṁ patte ākiri. Thero taṁ gahetvā bhagavato hatthe
anya-e0102n0:139_4: ṭhapesi. Bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghassa pahonakaṁ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Ekapattena ābhatā
anya-e0102n0:139_5: sabbesaṁ pahosi. Kākavaliyopi sattame divase seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ alatthāti.
anya-e0102n0:140_0: Na kevalañca thokassa bahukaraṇaṁ, madhuraṁ amadhuraṁ, amadhuraṁ madhurantiādīsupi
anya-e0102n0:140_1: yaṁ yaṁ icchati, sabbaṁ iddhimato ijjhati. Tathā hi mahāanuḷatthero nāma sambahule
anya-e0102n0:140_2: bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā sukkhabhattameva labhitvā gaṅgātīre nisīditvā paribhuñjamāne
anya-e0102n0:140_3: disvā gaṅgāya udakaṁ sappimaṇḍanti adhiṭṭhahitvā sāmaṇerānaṁ saññaṁ adāsi. Te thālakehi
anya-e0102n0:140_4: āharitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṁsu. Sabbe madhurena sappimaṇḍena bhuñjiṁsūti.
anya-e0102n0:141_0: Dibbenacakkhunāti idheva ṭhito ālokaṁ vaḍḍhetvā tassa brahmuno rūpaṁ passati. Idheva
anya-e0102n0:141_1: ca ṭhito sabbaṁ tassa bhāsato saddaṁ suṇāti. Cittaṁ pajānāti. Kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmetīti
anya-e0102n0:141_2: karajakāyassa vasena cittaṁ pariṇāmeti. Pādakajjhānacittaṁ gahetvā kāye āropeti.
anya-e0102n0:141_3: Kāyānugatikaṁ karoti dandhagamanaṁ. Kāyagamanaṁ hi dandhaṁ hoti. Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca
anya-e0102n0:141_4: okkamatīti pādakajjhānārammaṇena iddhicittena sahajātaṁ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca
anya-e0102n0:141_5: okkamati pavisati phasseti sampāpuṇāti. Sukhasaññā nāma upekkhāsampayuttasaññā. Upekkhā
anya-e0102n0:141_6: hi santaṁ sukhanti vuttā. Sāyeva ca saññā nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādīhi paccanīkehi
anya-e0102n0:141_7: ca vimuttattā lahusaññātipi veditabbā. Taṁ okkantassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu
anya-e0102n0:141_8: viya sallahuko hoti. So evaṁ vāyukkhittatūlapicunā viya sallahukena dissamānena kāyena
anya-e0102n0:141_9: brahmalokaṁ gacchati. Evaṁ gacchanto ca sace icchati pathavīkasiṇavasena ākāse maggaṁ
anya-e0102n0:141_10: nimminitvā padasā gacchati. Sace icchati vāyokasiṇavasena vāyuṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā tūlapicu
anya-e0102n0:141_11: viya vāyunā gacchati. Apica gantukāmatā eva ettha pamāṇaṁ. “Sati hi gantukāmatāya”
anya-e0102n0:141_12: evaṁ katacittādhiṭṭhāno adhiṭṭhānavegukkhittova so issāsakhittasaro viya dissamāno gacchati.
anya-e0102n0:142_0: Cittavasena kāyaṁ pariṇāmetīti kāyaṁ gahetvā citte āropeti. Cittānugatikaṁ karoti
anya-e0102n0:142_1: sīghagamanaṁ. Cittagamanaṁ hi sīghaṁ hoti. Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti
anya-e0102n0:142_2: rūpakāyārammaṇena iddhicittena sahajātaṁ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti. Sesaṁ
anya-e0102n0:142_3: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Idaṁ pana cittagamanameva hoti. Evaṁ adissamānena kāyena
anya-e0102n0:142_4: gacchanto panāyaṁ kiṁ tassa adhiṭṭhānacittassa uppādakkhaṇe gacchati, udāhu ṭhitikkhaṇe
anya-e0102n0:142_5: bhaṅgakkhaṇe vāti vutte tīsupi khaṇesu gacchatīti thero āha. Kiṁ pana so sayaṁ gacchati
anya-e0102n0:142_6: nimmitaṁ pesetīti. Yathāruci karoti. Idha panassa sayaṁ gamanameva āgataṁ.
anya-e0102n0:143_0: Manomayanti adhiṭṭhānamanena nimmitattā manomayaṁ. Ahīnindriyanti idaṁ cakkhusotādīnaṁ
anya-e0102n0:143_1: saṇṭhānavasena vuttaṁ. Nimmitarūpe pana pasādo nāma natthi. Sace iddhimā caṅkamati
anya-e0102n0:143_2: nimmitopi tattha caṅkamatītiādi sabbaṁ sāvakanimmitaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Buddhanimmito
anya-e0102n0:143_3: pana yaṁ yaṁ bhagavā karoti, taṁ tampi karoti. Bhagavato rucivasena aññampi karotīti.
anya-e0102n0:143_4: Ettha ca yaṁ so iddhimā idheva ṭhito dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
anya-e0102n0:143_5: saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena cittaṁ pajānāti, na ettāvatā kāyena vasaṁ vatteti.
anya-e0102n0:143_6: Yampi so idheva ṭhito tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n0:143_7: ettāvatāpi na kāyena vasaṁ vatteti. Yampissa dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātītiādikaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:143_8: ettāvatāpi na kāyena vasaṁ vatteti. Yampi so dissamānena vā adissamānena vā kāyena
anya-e0102n0:143_9: brahmalokaṁ gacchati, ettāvatāpi na kāyena vasaṁ vatteti. Yañca kho so tassa brahmuno
anya-e0102n0:143_10: purato rūpaṁ abhinimminātītiādinā nayena vuttavidhānaṁ āpajjati, ettāvatā kāyena
anya-e0102n0:143_11: vasaṁ vatteti nāmaṁ. Sesaṁ panettha kāyena vasaṁ vattanāya pubbabhāgadassanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n0:144_0: 398.Vikubbanāya pana manomayāya ca idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ. Vikubbanaṁ tāva karontena “so
anya-e0102n0:144_1: pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, nāgavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, supaṇṇavaṇṇaṁ
anya-e0102n0:144_2: vā dasseti, asuravaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, indavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, devavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti,
anya-e0102n0:144_3: brahmavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, samuddavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, pabbatavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, sīhavaṇṇaṁ
anya-e0102n0:144_4: vā dasseti, byagghavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, dīpivaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, hatthimpi dasseti, assampi
anya-e0102n0:144_5: dasseti, rathampi dasseti, pattimpi dasseti, vividhampi senābyūhaṁ dassetī”ti evaṁ
anya-e0102n0:144_6: vuttesu kumārakavaṇṇādīsu yaṁ yaṁ ākaṅkhati, taṁ taṁ adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Adhiṭṭhahantena
anya-e0102n0:144_7: ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarārammaṇato abhiññāpādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya attano kumārakavaṇṇo
anya-e0102n0:144_8: āvajjitabbo. Āvajjitvā parikammāvasāne puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya evarūpo nāma kumārako
anya-e0102n0:144_9: homīti adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ. Saha adhiṭṭhānacittena kumārako hoti devadatto viya. Esa nayo sabbattha.
anya-e0102n0:145_0: Hatthimpi dassetītiādi panettha bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vuttaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0102n0:145_1: hatthī homīti anadhiṭṭhahitvā hatthī hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ, assādīsupi eseva nayoti.
anya-e0102n0:146_0: 399.Manomayaṁ kātukāmo pana pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāyaṁ tāva āvajjitvā vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n0:146_1: susiro hotūti adhiṭṭhāti, susiro hoti. Athassa abbhantare aññaṁ kāyaṁ āvajjitvā parikammaṁ
anya-e0102n0:146_2: katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti, tassa abbhantare añño kāyo hotūti. So taṁ muñjamhā
anya-e0102n0:146_3: īsikaṁ viya kosiyā asiṁ viya karaṇḍāya ahiṁ viya ca abbāhati. Tena vuttaṁ “idha bhikkhu
anya-e0102n0:146_4: imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:146_5: Seyyathāpi puriso muñjamhā īsikaṁ pavāheyya, tassa evamassa ayaṁ muñjo ayaṁ īsikā,
anya-e0102n0:146_6: añño muñjo aññā īsikā, muñjamhātveva īsikā pavāḷhā”tiādi. Ettha ca yathā īsikādayo
anya-e0102n0:146_7: muñjādīhi sadisā honti, evaṁ manomayarūpaṁ iddhimatāsadisameva hotīti dassanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n0:146_8: etā upamā vuttāti. Ayaṁ manomayā iddhi.
